summary: A good girl is forced to join a dangerous all-girl high school gang, and only her waiter boyfriend and a caring female teacher can possibly help her before it may become too late.
cast: Yvonne Lime|Brett Halsey|Jana Lund|Susanne Sidney|Heather Ames|Nancy Kilgas|Rhoda Williams|Don Shelton|Viola Harris|Robert Anderson|Martin Braddock|Arthur Marshall|Tommy Cook|Bobby Gilbert|Troy Patterson
title: High School Hellcats
